meanings.definition: Treat with an excessive or absurd degree of indulgence and attention.
meanings.sent1: She mollycoddles her pet cat by giving it treats all day.
meanings.sent2: The mother mollycoddles her child by doing everything for them.
meanings.sent3: The wealthy lady mollycoddles her tiny dog with diamond-studded collars.
meanings.sent4: The coach mollycoddles the star player, always giving them special treatment.
meanings.sent5: He mollycoddles his plants, talking to them daily and giving them extra sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person who is pampered or overprotected.
meanings.sent1: The little princess was known as the family mollycoddles.
meanings.sent2: He grew up as a mollycoddles, never having to do anything for himself.
meanings.sent3: The mollycoddles of the group always gets the best seat and the most attention.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a mollycoddles in the luxurious spa, being pampered from head to toe.
meanings.sent5: The pampered mollycoddles was unprepared for the challenges of the real world.
